title: Cant log in !!
body: they keep telling me that i dont have the right information to log in my league of legends account , and when i try to reset my password , nothing happen , no email, i checked everywhere (spam folder), something wrong since the new update ?

replies.body:
Hmmmmm if the client is saying that your password is wrong, and you never get the password reset email you requested, there's a chance that your account may have been 'hacked'. Sometimes when someone else gets hold of your account, they change the password and then change the e-mail on the account to try and keep you from getting control of it again.

Reach out to us through our [Account Recovery Form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) (stay signed out when you do this) and we'll be able to help get your account safely back in your hands!
